titles.title: State Regulatory Representation Clarification Act of 2014
To clarify membership requirements for the Board of Directors of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: 11/20/2014--Introduced. State Regulatory Representation Clarification Act of 2014 - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to require that one of the presidential appointees to the Board of Directors of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) once served as a state bank supervisor.
